1.0.0.name: wordpress/juiz-smart-mobile-admin
1.0.0.description:
Used with the default administration theme, this plugin offers you a smartphone support for your dashboard. Some other plugins are already supported (part of WPML, Simple Image Sizes, Next Gen Gallery, etc.), but the diversity of the WordPress community can't permit the Juiz SMA plugin to be perfect.

Some features :

  • Translation ready (EN, FR and ES already supported)
  • Others translation : LT (Lithuanian - by Vincent G from Host1Free)
  • Can zoom in a specific area (iPhone and iPod tested).
  • Jump links (from footer to content, from content to menu).
  • Automatic slide in the content when you click in a menu item.
  • Auto-hide Safari iPhone (iOS<5) URL bar.
  • Improvement of tables display
  • Admin bar support (option for shortcuts plugin)
  • Other goodies...

Important : this plugin was only tested by myself in iPhone in a specific context. If you have b
